keyPolicies.policyTitle: Creating jobs and providing more family homes
Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Nick Clegg’s tax plan means that you will pay no tax on the first £10,000 you earn – cutting most tax bills by £700.

housing.content: Creating jobs and providing more family homes

images.caption: People in conversation, with one recognized as Bill Greene, and the text 'Creating jobs and providing more family homes'
Candidate portrait with text 'Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket' and 'Change that works for you'
